item.description:
Ridley's Scott's Prometheus is out and we should meetup and see it as a group.

I suggest seeing it at 8:15 PM on Saturday night, June 9th. If I get enough positive responses (say 6) by Friday 5PM, we go !

Prometheus 3D
Opens tomorrow, June 8, 2012 | Runtime:2 hr 3 min
R
Brief Language, Sci-Fi Violence and Some Intense Images
The discovery of a clue to mankind's origins on Earth leads a team of explorers to the darkest parts of the universe. Two brilliant young scientists lead the expedition. Shaw (Noomi Rapace) hopes that they will meet a race of benevolent, godlike Read More
Cast: Noomi Rapace, Michael Fassbender, Charlize Theron
Director: Ridley Scott
Genres: Action/Adventure, Sci-Fi/Fantasy, 3D
item.name: Saturday Night Movie - P R O M E T H E U S 3 D
